body.name: JISULIFE Handheld Fan with 4500 mAh Powerbank Max 46 Hours Runtime,Pocket Fan Portable Battery Operated or USB Powered Folding Personal Fan,3 Speeds,Gifts for Women Men Kids Gift for Festival-Green
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 47 mins
features: 【Super Long Endurance and Updated Strong Airflow】Adopted the advanced technology, it lasts for 46 hours at speed 1, 35 hours at speed 2, 13 hours at speed 3 after about 3-4 hours full charge. With enlarged blades, the wind increased 30% compared to the original version.The maximum rotating speed of the fan is 3400 rpm which is enough for personal use to keep you cool.

【Foldable Design and Mini Size】The folding design makes it easy to be carried and stored. Besides, with the capsule shape(5.1*1.65*1.65 inch, weight: 6.38 OZ), this rechargeable fan can hide the fan blade, small and easy to slide into your pocket and purse.Gifts choice for Christmas & New year.

【Power Bank Function and Quiet Operation】5V/1A USB output port makes the mini fan a power bank(4500mAh) in emergency, supplying power for mobile phone, MP3, or iPod, etc. With no frame design, makes the noise to 50 db which cause no bothering during work.

【Flashlight and Include Wrist String】Long press the power button to open the flashlight feature when fan is not spinning. The flashlight is quite bright and can be useful in dark areas or if electricity is out. And with lanyard included,you can hang it on hands or travel backpack.

【Safety and One Year Warranty】The touchable blades, surge and short circuit protection, keep you and your family safe. We believe in our products thus we offer 12 month worry-free warranty, it covers material and workmanship defects for one year from the original purchase date. Patent: US D886,982 S

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect travel fan. It has 3 speeds and it holds a charge for a very long time. It's very compact when folded so it easily fits in a purse or pocket. I've purchased several fans for travel and this one is by far the best. It also has a flashlight, charger feature, and a small carrying strap. This product seems to be very well made and I believe it's a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a lot of hot flashes so this fan is always with me or by my side. I have used it a lot since I bought it and it still holds up the charge from when I started using it. It's quiet, has low, medium and high setting. One button controls speed and flashlight. If you accidentally get in the way while it's running, the blades it will stop immediately as a safety precaution, but the blades are soft plastic and it doesn't hurt.Small enough to fit it my purse, quiet enough for the movie theater, I am super happy with this purchase. Amazing product! Absolutely recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It is getting to be that time of year where fans are essential to staying cool. I looked into quite a few handheld fans and was "blown away," by this one (pun intended) so much that I bought a second one so I can share when I'm out and about with friends or family!This fan has amazing features, and I did a full video review for you to see it in action. For those of you who don't have time to listen to the video or those might be hearing impaired, I'll type the overall narrative of the video as well. 🙂• Feature #1: Fan- This fan can be used both by holding it, and folding it back and sitting it on a flat surface like a table fan which is so convenient.- The fan has 3 speed settings in the order of low, medium, then high, and pushing the button a 4th time will turn off the fan.- I'd say this little fan comes packed with power and cools you off pretty well.- The fan blades are made of a hard plastic, so it does hurt if you accidentally get hit by them more than the cheap fans with foam blades would. The only dislike I have is that if you accidentally hit the blades, the fan stops versus the cheaper fans you find with foam blades just start back up again.Feature #2: Powerbank- So I have a pretty powerful power bank (I strongly recommend people invest in a good one) that I always keep charged and doubt I will have to use this as a powerbank. It does work as a powerbank, but it will charge your phone pretty slow, and may possibly die before the phone finishes charging - don't hold me to that though as I have not tested it. It could work in a pinch though to save you from your phone dying. For comparison, when I plugged my phone to charge with the powerbank, it was going to take my phone 3.5 hours to charge for having 9% battery versus my phone using original plug in charger and having a "fast charge," in 1.5 hours. Mind you, that is from the charging cord that came with the fan.- You can only use the USB port to charge your device. If you have a 2 sided type c cable, that won't work.Feature #3: Flashlight- If you hold down the power button, it will turn on the flashlight at the bottom of the fan. You hold the button down again to turn it off.- I have found 2 ways to use it: one with the fan completely closed, and one with the fan open to make a wider light. Both work pretty well, thought the option with the fan closed seems to be just a little brighter.I hope this review is helpful, and I hope you all enjoy this fan as much as I did!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well-designed and works well
reviews.reviewText: This is still a liiiittle on the big size (fits well into my hand but not super well into my purse) but I was otherwise impressed with how easy it was to use and how strong the fan is. This is fantastic for hot summers. I love the flashlight, too, that can be useful in an emergency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simply the best!
reviews.reviewText: This is the greatest portable little fan ever! First off, it’s cute. Second, the fact that it also has flashlight and a portable charger is simply fantastic. I bought this along with several other portable fans for a recent trip to Japan (it was 95+ the whole time) and only this one ended up making the cut. It fit perfectly in the pocket of my backpack and it went everywhere with me. While it didn’t keep me super cool due to it being so incredibly hot, it did keep me from being super sweaty and that in itself kept me sane. Charger portion works great! Even after all day use, still had enough battery to charge my phone and my mom’s. The flashlight is bright and easy to use. Durability is good as I dropped it several times and it still works. It is a bit on the louder side when on high but it didn’t bother anyone around me. It’s also on the heavier side for a portable fan but with all it’s factors, I can overlook it. Overall, one of my favorite purchases on amazon by far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Scorching Florida Heat Survival Essential at Disney World
reviews.reviewText: When it comes to conquering the scorching Florida heat at Disney World, the JISULIFE Handheld Fan emerges as the unsung hero of your family vacation. Quiet, long-lasting, and utterly indispensable, these fans are a game-changer that saved your entire trip.Here's why these handheld fans deserve a standing ovation:Pros:Whisper-Quiet Operation: These fans are stealthy in their cooling magic, operating quietly without disturbing your precious moments at the happiest place on Earth.Incredible Battery Life: A single charge that lasts for days is a superpower in the battle against the Florida sun. No more fretting about recharging; these fans have your back throughout your Disney adventures.Family Vacation Saver: In the unforgiving heat of Florida, these fans come to the rescue, ensuring that everyone in the family stays cool, comfortable, and content. They transform a potentially sweltering ordeal into a delightful and memorable experience.Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐In summary, the JISULIFE Handheld Fan is your vacation's secret weapon when tackling the relentless Florida heat at Disney World. Their quiet operation, exceptional battery life, and family-saving capabilities make them a must-have accessory for future theme park adventures. They're more than just fans; they're your companions in creating cherished memories. Your recommendation speaks volumes: Once you've experienced the magic of these fans, there's no turning back. Don't embark on your next theme park expedition without these trusty cooling companions in your backpack.

This fan is amazing! It really does the trick with cooling you down. The flashlight works, you only have to hold the power button for a few seconds. It is hard to open the first time (use a knife or something), but as long as you don't push too hard to close it back, it's pretty easy to open after.It can be use as a battery pack to charge your phone, it's well designed as you can have it stand on a table while using the fan. The only con is that the instruction were not in English, but it's pretty easy to use.I highly recommend, you will not regret!
Es el segundo que tenemos y está muy bien. Es algo pesado normal para lo que lleva. Recomendable.

reviews.reviewTitle: La ventilation, le poids, le bruit
reviews.reviewText: Il a une très bonne ventilation, il a 3 vitesses. La première est très silencieuse ainsi que la deuxième la troisième elle fait un peu de bruit mais beaucoup moins que d'autres petits ventilateurs. Le poids de l'appareil assez léger, on peut le mettre dans la poche, un sac et la batterie est de longue durée (4800) de puissance. Je vous le recommande vivement. Et il fait en plus lampe de poche.

The media could not be loaded. El ventilador está muy bien, de tamaño pequeño pero es un aparato de mucha calidad. Se me ha caído un par de veces y sigue intacto. La batería dura mucho. Para apagarlo se pueden parar las aspas con la mano sin problemas. Al abrirlo si se tira hacia atrás y se deja en ángulo recto se sostiene solo.Como curiosidad comentar que la linterna tiene mucho alcance, no sé decir pero seguro que llega a diez metros de distancia aunque no se que utilidad tiene algo así en un ventilador pero bueno... Ahí está. Y también decir que la linterna y el ventilador duran muchísimas horas.

En el verano ha dado mucho aire. Es para nuestros hijos pequeños, de 9 y 10 años, se para en cuanto se toca, no corta los dedos, tiene luz para por la noche, es bateria, que mas se puede pedir. ME ENCANTA
